name: 3D First Person Shooter Tutorial
description:
Description:

This version of the game is the tutorial so it is short and to the point. The model shows the basic workings of prefabs, scripts, NavMesh,  and building custom Terrain, in addition to all the Unity basics that we have developed over the course of the semester such as audio components or lighting. 

Modifications:

  1. I plan on designing multiple more levels to the game, so that the levels are harder and more coherent than our tutorial levels. 
  2. I plan to modify the player's movement in scripts. 
  3.  I plan on giving my player a different gun with different functionality, to make the user experience more unique.  
  4. I plan to change all the audio and make the game feel more unique by changing the esthetic to guns, enemies, and the map for each level.
